item.title: USEF Names U.S. Driving Team for CHIO Aachen
item.description:
USEF Names U.S. Driving Team for CHIO Aachen

Lexington, Ky. - The United States Equestrian Federation (USEF) has named the U.S. Driving Team for CHIO Aachen. The CAIO4*-H4 division of CHIO Aachen will take place July 13-17, 2016, in Aachen, Germany. Ed Young will serve as Chef d'Equipe for the team. The following combinations will compose the U.S.

item.title: Hunters and Jumpers Return to The Rock
item.description:
Hunters and Jumpers Return to The Rock

A champion Hunter at work at the L. M. Tate Show Grounds (Blowing Rock Charity Horse Show Foundation archives) Blowing Rock, N.C. -- From July 27th to August 7th the historic mountain town of Blowing Rock will host the 93rd consecutive Blowing Rock Charity Horse Show.

item.title: USEF Names Hermès U.S. Show Jumping Teams for CSIO5* Dublin and CSIO5* Hickstead
item.description:
USEF Names Hermès U.S. Show Jumping Teams for CSIO5* Dublin and CSIO5* Hickstead

Lexington, Ky. - The United States Equestrian Federation (USEF) has named the Hermès U.S. Show Jumping Teams for CSIO5* Dublin and CSIO5* Hickstead. CSIO5* Dublin will take place July 20-24, 2016, in Dublin, Ireland, while CSIO5* Hickstead will run July 28-31, 2016 in West Sussex, United Kingdom.

item.title: Kent Farrington and Gazelle Win $375,000 Pan American Cup, Presented by Rolex, at Spruce Meadows
item.description:
Kent Farrington and Gazelle Win $375,000 Pan American Cup, Presented by Rolex, at Spruce Meadows

Kent Farrington and Gazelle (Spruce Meadows Media Services) Calgary, AB, Canada - USA's Kent Farrington and Gazelle were the big winners in Saturday's $375,000 Pan American Cup, presented by Rolex, in a fast and competitive seven-horse jump-off at Spruce Meadows. Conor Swail (IRL) and Grafton finished second, and Andrew Ramsay (USA) and California 62 placed third.

item.title: USEF Names Land Rover U.S. Eventing Team for Land Rover Great Meadow International presented by Adequan® CICO3*
item.description:
USEF Names Land Rover U.S. Eventing Team for Land Rover Great Meadow International presented by Adequan® CICO3*

Lexington, Ky. - The United States Equestrian Federation (USEF) has named the Land Rover U.S. Eventing Team for the Land Rover Great Meadow International presented by Adequan® CICO3*. The CICO3* will take place July 8-10, 2016, in The Plains, Va. USEF Eventing Team Coach David O'Connor will serve as Chef d'Equipe.

item.title: Dazzling Launch for Global Champions League Teams and 2016 Global Champions Tour
